Let's import the `FAF__litter.csv` csv.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import the `FAS_litters.csv` csv using a relative path.

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
#litters_df = read_csv(file.choose())
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)

```

Import the same dataset using an absolute path.

```{r}
litters_df_abs = read_csv("~/Desktop/data_warngling_i/data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df_abs = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)

```
